children.label: There is no safe place for my box to be left

content.title: Thanks! Your feedback helps us feed you.
content.message:
At Gousto we look to the future. For example, by the end of 2019 we’ve pledged to reduce the plastic in our boxes by 50%.

By reducing wasted food with every Gousto box ordered, between us we can work towards a more sustainable ecosystem.

_If you’re still keen to pause your account, hit the button below._

content.title: Thanks!
content.message:
Your Gousto subscription is now paused, but reactivating is easy. Just head to the Subscription tab in your account and turn it back on whenever you like. It’s a totally flexible subscription, so you can skip boxes, rather than pausing, anytime.

You can always order a one-off box, too. Hit "add box" in the Deliveries tab without needing to turn on your subscription.

When you fancy cooking inspiring meals, with fresh ingredients delivered to your door, you know where to find us.

See you soon!

content.title: Great!
content.message: Your account is still active. We hope you enjoy your next box!
